Epysteme
========

Epysteme is a python package for machine learning and related tasks.

Requirements
------------
- Python 2.? or 3.?
- Numpy 1.?

.. Installation
.. ------------
.. Epysteme is conveniently available on pypi. Simply install using either::
.. 
..     pip install epysteme
.. 
.. or::
.. 
..     easy_install epysteme
